title: Brisket with Carrots & Mushrooms
directions: In a small bowl, combine peppercorns and 2 tbsp. onion soup powder. Using a paring knife, make 8 small slits all over the beef and stuff each hole with a garlic clove. Rub the peppercorn mixture on the brisket.
Combine carrots, onions, and mushrooms in a 9x13-in. baking disk. Place the brisket on top and cover tightly with aluminum foil.

Bake for 1 hour, then lower temperature to 325 degrees F and cook for another hour. Lower oven to 300 degrees and cook for 2 more hours until meat is tender. To serve, slice the brisket across the grain and sprinkle with parsley.
